mapper.select: select * from TB_DPST_PROD_INFO WHERE dpst_id=#{dpstId}
SELECT * FROM tb_dpst_amt_lmt WHERE LMT_DPST_ID = #{dpstId}
SELECT PERIOD_MIN_MONTH as minMonth, period_max_month as maxMonth FROM TB_DPST_PROD_PERIOD WHERE period_dpst_id=#{dpstId}
SELECT wdrw_min_month AS minMonths, wdrw_max AS maxCount, wdrw_dpst_id AS dpstId FROM TB_DPST_PARTIAL_WDRW_INFO WHERE wdrw_dpst_id = #{dpstId}
SELECT amt_currency AS currency, amt_min AS minAmt, amt_dpst_id AS dpstId FROM TB_DPST_PARTIAL_WDRW_AMT WHERE amt_dpst_id = #{dpstId}
SELECT acct_no, acct_pw, acct_balance from tb_cust_acct where acct_cust_code=#{acctCustCode} AND acct_status=1
SELECT frgn_acct_no, frgn_acct_pw from tb_cust_frgn_acct where frgn_acct_cust_code=#{frgnAcctCustCode} AND frgn_acct_status=1
SELECT * FROM TB_FRGN_ACCT_BALANCE WHERE BAL_FRGN_ACCT_NO = #{balFrgnAcctNo}
select * from TB_CURRENCY_INFO
select * from TB_CURRENCY_INFO where cur_code=#{curCode}
select pref_rate from TB_PREF_RATE_INFO where pref_currency=#{currency}
SELECT DPST_ID, DPST_NAME, DPST_INFO, DPST_STATUS FROM TB_DPST_PROD_INFO WHERE DPST_STATUS = 3 ORDER BY DPST_REG_DT DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_DPST_PROD_INFO WHERE DPST_STATUS = 3

SELECT I.DPST_ID, I.DPST_NAME, I.DPST_INFO, I.DPST_TYPE, I.DPST_CURRENCY, I.DPST_RATE_TYPE, I.DPST_MIN_YN, I.DPST_MAX_YN, I.DPST_STATUS, I.DPST_DESCRIPT, I.DPST_PERIOD_TYPE, I.DPST_MIN_AGE, I.DPST_MAX_AGE, I.DPST_AUTO_RENEW_YN, I.DPST_ADD_PAY_YN, I.DPST_ADD_PAY_MAX, I.DPST_PART_WDRW_YN, I.DPST_REG_DT, I.DPST_APP_NO, I.DPST_APP_DY, I.DPST_DELIB_NO, I.DPST_DELIB_DY, I.DPST_DELIB_START_DY, I.DPST_INFO_PDF,
W.WDRW_MIN_MONTH, W.WDRW_MAX, WA.AMT_CURRENCY, WA.AMT_MIN,
P.PERIOD_MIN_MONTH, P.PERIOD_MAX_MONTH, P.PERIOD_FIXED_MONTH,
L.LMT_CURRENCY, L.LMT_MIN_AMT, L.LMT_MAX_AMT
FROM TB_DPST_PROD_INFO I LEFT JOIN TB_DPST_PROD_PERIOD P ON TRIM(I.DPST_ID) = TRIM(P.PERIOD_DPST_ID) LEFT JOIN TB_DPST_PARTIAL_WDRW_INFO W ON TRIM(I.DPST_ID) = TRIM(W.WDRW_DPST_ID) LEFT JOIN TB_DPST_PARTIAL_WDRW_AMT WA ON TRIM(I.DPST_ID) = TRIM(WA.AMT_DPST_ID) LEFT JOIN TB_DPST_AMT_LMT L ON TRIM(I.DPST_ID) = TRIM(L.LMT_DPST_ID)
WHERE TRIM(I.DPST_ID) = TRIM(#{dpstId})

SELECT THIST_FILE FROM ( SELECT H.THIST_FILE FROM TB_TERMS_HIST H INNER JOIN TB_TERMS_MASTER M ON H.THIST_TERM_CATE = M.TERM_CATE AND H.THIST_TERM_ORDER = M.TERM_ORDER WHERE M.TERM_TITLE = #{productName} ORDER BY H.THIST_VERSION DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT BASE_DATE, CURRENCY, RATE_1M, RATE_2M, RATE_3M, RATE_4M, RATE_5M, RATE_6M, RATE_7M, RATE_8M, RATE_9M, RATE_10M, RATE_11M, RATE_12M FROM EXCHANGE_RATE_12M WHERE BASE_DATE = #{baseDate} ORDER BY CURRENCY
select acct_pw from tb_cust_acct where acct_no=#{acctNo}
select frgn_acct_pw from tb_cust_frgn_acct where frgn_acct_no=#{frgnAcctNo}

SELECT BASE_DATE AS baseDate, CURRENCY AS currency, RATE_1M AS rate1M, RATE_2M AS rate2M, RATE_3M AS rate3M, RATE_4M AS rate4M, RATE_5M AS rate5M, RATE_6M AS rate6M, RATE_7M AS rate7M, RATE_8M AS rate8M, RATE_9M AS rate9M, RATE_10M AS rate10M, RATE_11M AS rate11M, RATE_12M AS rate12M, CREATED_AT AS createdAt FROM EXCHANGE_RATE_12M WHERE CURRENCY = #{currency} ORDER BY BASE_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CUST_TRAN_HIST ( TRAN_ACCT_NO, TRAN_CUST_NAME, TRAN_TYPE, TRAN_AMOUNT, TRAN_REC_ACCT_NO, TRAN_REC_NAME, TRAN_REC_BK_CODE, TRAN_ESIGN_YN, TRAN_ESIGN_DT, TRAN_DT, TRAN_CURRENCY ) VALUES ( #{tranAcctNo}, #{tranCustName}, #{tranType}, #{tranAmount}, #{tranRecAcctNo}, #{tranRecName}, #{tranRecBkCode}, #{tranEsignYn}, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{tranEsignDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF3'), SYSDATE, #{tranCurrency} )
mapper.select: SELECT TERM_TITLE, thist_term_order, thist_term_cate, thist_file, THIST_CONTENT FROM TB_TERMS_MASTER m JOIN tb_TERMS_HIST h ON m.term_cate = h.thist_term_cate AND m.term_order = h.thist_term_order WHERE m.term_cate = 4 AND h.thist_version = ( SELECT MAX(thist_version) FROM tb_TERMS_HIST WHERE thist_term_cate = m.term_cate AND thist_term_order = m.term_order )
select thist_file, thist_content from tb_terms_hist where thist_term_order=#{thistTermOrder} and thist_term_cate=#{thistTermCate} order by thist_version desc FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
